name: Vs Bloxxin Full Mod
description:
Week 1: So it looks like Boyfriend and Girlfriend have fallen into another game. While they're having fun with Noob, it appears there is only one way out. Will they be able to escape ROBLOX or will they be stuck forever? This is only the beginning...

Week 2: Seeing that they can't escape ROBLOX anytime soon, Noob suggests they have a performance with Guest since there was word about them in ROBLOX. It may seem that things would go normal, or will there be a mishap to be unexpected after their performance?

Weeks 3 - 6: ???
